animationSystem¶

class animationSystem.AnimationSystem(event_manager, world)[source]¶

Computes which frame of animation should be displayed.

Attributes:
  • evManager: event manager
  • world: game world
handle_player_moved_event()[source]¶

When player moves and doesn’t attack, show walk or jump animation.

handle_player_stopped_movement_event()[source]¶

When player doesn’t move or attack, then show his idle animation.

notify(event)[source]¶

Notify, when event occurs.

Parameters:event (events.Event) – occured event
run_animations(dt)[source]¶

Computes which animation frame should be displayed. Every CPU tick checks if new frame should be displayed. Therefore there is a counter for each animation that measures time. When time equal delay between frames passed, next frame will be displayed.

Parameters:dt (int) – time passed
update_image_position(entity_ID, new_position)[source]¶

Update image position, when corresponding entity moved.

Parameters:
  • entity_ID (int) – entity
  • new_position (int tuple) – new position of the entity
